oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Blount. William Blount.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eleanor Wiley
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Miniature of William Blount painted by Knoxville artist Eleanor Wiley. Ca. 1930? Original was painted on celluloid and is shrinking and deteriorating. This image is a digitally restored version.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Portrait paintings; Miniatures (Paintings);
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
